hero.title: Specialized Legal Advisory in Securities and Financial Law
hero.subtitle: Legal protection, regulatory compliance, and strategic legal guidance for financial institutions, fintechs, and corporations.

intro.text: Over 10 years of experience in securities law, financial regulation, compliance, and consulting for financial institutions and fintech companies.

items: Development of risk matrices and models.
Coordination of internal and external audits.

area3.title: Legal Consulting for Fintechs
items: Legal strategies for innovative financial products.
Data privacy, information protection, and immigration documentation.

area4.title: Administrative, Tax, and Corporate Litigation
items: Drafting of briefs, appeals, and case tracking.
Assistance in tax and corporate proceedings.
